Title: iSpy a Mean Teacher
Plot: The topic for the next iCarly webcast is figuring out what mean teachers do outside of school. When Carly and Freddie follow Ms. Briggs home, they get stuck inside her house.
GuestStars: J.R. Nutt (iCarly viewer),  Samantha Aisling (Connie), Mindy Sterling (Ms. Briggs),  Libe Barer (Tareen)
